title: Houston, Texas
content:
• Average 5-yr OSHA Recordable Rate = 0.56 % (Pasadena area industries: 1.05)
  • Recognized by Texas Chemical Council
  • "Excellence in Caring for Texas" awarded 1st in Texas in 2002 our plant size category
  • "Distinguished Service Award" for exceptional safety performance past 5 years
  • Responsible Care Gold Performance Award
  • ISO 9001-2008 Certified
  • 99+% First Time Right
  • 98+% On Time Shipments
  • Produces components as well as finshed packages for the lubricant and fuels markets
  • No waiver policy for raw materials and finished goods

content:
• RCMS:2008 by ULDQS Mgmt Systems Solutions
  • ISO 9001:2008
  • Produces components for the lubricants market
  • 100% on time shipment performance
  • 99.69% right first time performance
  • No waiver policy for raw materials and finished goods

title: Manchester, United Kingdom
content:
• ISO 9001 certified since 1992 (Quality Management standard
  • ISO 14001 certified since 2004 (Environmental Management System standard)
  • IPPC registered (Integrated Pollution Prevention and Control) control of immissions arrising from industrial activities
  • CRC registered, UK Energy Efficiancy Scheme to reduce CO2 immisions.
  • Produces components and finished packages for the industrial and metalworking markets
  • No waiver policy for raw materials and finished goods

content:
• Products

title: Hyderabad, India
content:
• ISO 9001 certified since 2006
  • ETP - Effluent treatment program that recovers water from manufacturing process to be used gardens for growing plants and fruit trees.
  • APPCB registered (Andhra Pradesh Pollution Control Board - India) environmental control and emmisions.
  • Produces components and finished packages for the industrial and metalworking markets
  • No waiver policy for raw materials and finished goods
